Package dev.orne.i18n.context

Interface I18nContextProvider.Configurer

All Known Implementing Classes:
I18nSpringConfiguration, I18nSpringWebConfiguration
Enclosing interface:
I18nContextProvider
@API(status=EXPERIMENTAL, since="0.1") public static interface I18nContextProvider.Configurer
Interface for configuration classes that need to set I18N context provider instances to use.
Since:
0.1
Version:
1.0, 2024-08
Author:
(w) Iker Hernaez
